name: Scream of the Viking
description: Scream of the Viking is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass various levels playing for the last of Vikings. In this game you need to collect items, overcome various traps and obstacles in order to help the Viking get to his home.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 1.2 Ghz + Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard\Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 600 MB available space
